text.name: Hugo
text.introSection: . I’m a fullstack web developer with a passion for creating modern, functional, and well-structured applications. From backend to frontend, I love the entire development process and especially enjoy solving complex problems. I also have experience in mobile app development.
text.tecnologiesSection: I primarily work with technologies like Express to build robust and scalable APIs. On the frontend, I often use frameworks like React and Angular to develop interactive interfaces. I also use Astro to create fast and optimized sites. Additionally, I have experience in mobile app development with React Native, which allows me to build cross-platform applications with a great user experience.
text.learningSection: I’m a quick learner, always looking to improve my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest technology trends. Whether working in a team or individually, I enjoy collaborating on projects and finding innovative solutions that bring real value.
text.finalSection: If you're looking for someone who can build applications from start to finish, I’d love to work with you and help take your project to the next level.
